author: John S
title: Service above and beyond expecations
text:
I stayed at the Hotel Belleclaire in February on a business trip. It is a recently renovated hotel. My room was small (typical for Manhattan hotels) but was very comfortable, including the bed. The reason I am giving the hotel five stars was because the hotel, in particular David at the front desk, went above and beyond to accommodate me during a snowstorm which had gotten in the way of my attending a meeting. Despite having checked out, David was able to get me a private room to do my skype meeting, taking the time to do so despite the short notice. David was also extremely friendly, and kept me calm in what was a stressful situation. I highly recommend this hotel and thank David and the rest of the staff for outstanding service.
